characters.name: ??? → Buddy Faith
characters.description1: The victim in this case. Why was he killed in my office?
characters.description2: A detective in this precinct, and the victim. Why was he killed in my office?

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Homicide detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Jacques Portsman
characters.description1: A high prosecutor with this prosecutor's office. It's my first time speaking with him.

characters.name: Maggey Byrde
characters.description1: Gumshoe knew her from when she was an officer. She now works as nighttime security.

characters.name: ??? → Akbey Hicks
characters.description1: The victim. Was seated in First Class like myself, but I don't know his name.
characters.description2: The victim. Was seated in First Class like myself.
characters.description3: The victim. Was seated in First Class like myself. Interpol agent in charge of smuggling cases.

characters.name: Rhoda Teneiro
characters.description1: A GoYou Airlines flight attendant charged with taking care of First Class.

characters.name: Zinc Lablanc
characters.description1: From N. European Republic of Borginia. Says he's a wealthy art dealer. Time-obsessed.

characters.name: Cammy Meele
characters.description1: A GoYou Airlines flight attendant charged with taking care of First Class.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: Daughter of my mentor, Manfred von Karma. Prosecutor at age 13. Lives in Germany.
characters.description2: Daughter of my mentor, Manfred von Karma. Prosecutor. Came here on assignment.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Homicide detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Homicide detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Ernest Amano
characters.description1: Benefactor when I studied in Germany. Director of the Amano Group.

characters.name: Lance Amano
characters.description1: Son of Ernest Amano. Victim of the kidnapping. I knew him when he was a child.
characters.description2: Kidnapping victim. Escaped from  the kidnappers' hideout and was found at the stadium.

characters.name: Kay Faraday
characters.description1: Self-purported Great Thief. She suddenly appeared, but why was she stalking me?
characters.description2: Self-purported Great Thief. She claims to be the Yatagarasu, but...

characters.name: Shi-Long Lang
characters.description1: An Interpol Agent. He is in charge of this kidnapping case for some odd reason.
characters.description2: Boasts he has the highest arrest rate in Interpol. In charge of kidnapping case.

characters.name: Shih-na
characters.description1: Lang's trusty secretary. Level-headed, she supports him in his investigations.

characters.name: Oliver Deacon
characters.description1: Amano family butler, and Lance's private tutor. Could not be contacted recently.
characters.description2: Amano family butler, and Lance's private tutor. Was found dead.
characters.description3: A felon named Colin Devorae. Became Amano family butler after escape. Found dead.
characters.description4: Murder victim. A felon. Was separated from his daughter, Lauren Paups.

characters.name: Mike Meekins
characters.description1: Precinct police officer. Was conducting investigation while in Blue Badger costume.

characters.name: Lauren Paups
characters.description1: Lance Amano's girlfriend. Came to Gatewater Land in search of Lance.
characters.description2: Lance Amano's girlfriend. Conspired with Deacon to kidnap Lance.
characters.description3: Lance Amano's girlfriend. 1 of the kidnappers. Separated from her real father, Deacon.

characters.name: Ema Skye
characters.description1: High schooler in Europe to become forensic scientist. On school break.

characters.name: Security Lady
characters.description1: The lady inside the Pink Badger. I believe her real name is Wendy Oldbag.

characters.name: Manfred von Karma
characters.description1: My mentor who has never known defeat in 35 years. A legendary prosecutor.

characters.name: Byrne Faraday
characters.description1: Prosecutor in Embassy staff killing case. Accused by Rell of being the Yatagarasu.
characters.description2: Prosecutor of the KG-8 Incident. Stabbed to death with knife in Lobby No. 2.

characters.name: Deid Mann
characters.description1: Cohdopian Embassy staff member. Was gunned down in front of Embassy by Rell.

characters.name: Mack Rell
characters.description1: Embassy staff killing suspect. Arrested on suspicion for the handgun he was carrying.
characters.description2: Embassy staff killing suspect. He was killed in Lobby No. 2 with the handgun.

characters.name: Yatagarasu
characters.description1: Real identity is unknown, but claims to be a noble thief. Infiltrated the Embassy.

characters.name: ??? → Kay Faraday
characters.description1: A girl with a balloon. During the recess, she asked me to change some coins for her.
characters.description2: Mr. Faraday's daughter. It seems she talked with Det. Gumshoe during the recess.

characters.name: The Judge
characters.description1: Judge in Embassy staff killing case.
characters.description2: Judge in Embassy staff killing case. Testifies no one was in the hallway for a short time.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: New rookie detective at the precinct. First crime scene. Seems very enthusiastic.
characters.description2: New rookie det. at precinct. Being held on suspicion of Faraday's and Rell's murder.

characters.name: Calisto Yew
characters.description1: Lawyer of embassy staff killing defendant, Rell. I was to battle her in court.

characters.name: Tyrell Badd
characters.description1: Eagle-eyed homicide det. Was called in to be expert witness on the Yatagarasu case.

characters.name: Manny Coachen
characters.description1: Cohdopian Embassy staff member. He was the suspect in the KG-8 Incident.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: My mentor's daughter. Studying to be a prosecutor in Germany, back on break.

characters.name: Kay Faraday
characters.description1: Young girl purporting to be the 2nd Yatagarasu. She's on the trail of her father's killer.
characters.description2: Young girl purporting to be the 2nd Yatagarasu. Is being accused of Coachen's murder.
characters.description3: Young girl purporting to be the 2nd Yatagarasu. She's on the trail of her father's killer.

characters.name: Byrne Faraday
characters.description1: Father of Kay, and admirable prosecutor, he was killed 7 years ago by Calisto Yew
characters.description2: A key member of the 3-man group, Yatagarasu. He was murdered by Calisto Yew.

characters.name: Calisto Yew
characters.description1: Killed Kay's father 7 years ago. Claimed to be Yatagarasu and then made her escape.
characters.description2: Killed Kay's father 7 years ago. A mole planted by the ring into the Yatagarasu.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Homicide detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Shih-na
characters.description1: Lang's trusty secretary. Level-headed, she supports him in his investigations.
characters.description2: Lang's trusty secretary. She was investigating the room next to Coachen's office.
characters.description3: Was Lang's trusty secretary, but turned out to be a spy by the name of Calisto Yew.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: Daughter of my mentor, Manfred von Karma. Cooperating w/ Interpol on smuggling case.
characters.description2: Daughter of my mentor, Manfred von Karma. Is accused of DeMasque II's murder.
characters.description3: Daughter of my mentor, Manfred von Karma. Cooperating w/ Interpol on smuggling case.

characters.name: Colias Palaeno
characters.description1: Ambassador of Babahl who will do absolutely everything for his country's tourism industry.

characters.name: Manny Coachen
characters.description1: The victim. Amb. Palaeno's secretary and secretariat. Apparently, was a good man.
characters.description2: Amb. Palaeno's secretary and secretariat who was defendant of KG-8. This case's victim.
characters.description3: While secretary to the amb., was also leader of smuggling ring. This case's victim.
characters.description4: Victim of Babahl case. Was involved with smuggling ring while being secretariat.

characters.name: Shi-Long Lang
characters.description1: Boasts he has the highest arrest rate in Interpol. He is after the smuggling ring.

characters.name: Quercus Alba
characters.description1: Ambassador of Allebahst. Also retired army man. May explain why overly-harsh on himself.
characters.description2: Ambassador of Allebahst, but is actually the ringleader. Has extraterritorial rights.

characters.name: Larry Butz
characters.description1: The man under the Steel Samurai mask. Sadly, he is a friend from grade school.
characters.description2: The man under the Steel Samurai mask. A friend. The suspect in DeMasque II case.
characters.description3: The man under the Steel Samurai mask. Sadly, he is a friend from grade school.

characters.name: Tyrell Badd
characters.description1: Eagle-eyed homicide det. His partner was killed 7 yrs. ago. He's here after Calisto Yew.
characters.description2: Eagle-eyed homicide det. He was a member of the 3-person group, the Yatagarasu.

characters.name: Mask☆DeMasque II
characters.description1: Opportunist unrelated to 1st DeMasque. Found in Allebahst. Real name: Ka-Shi Nou.
characters.description2: Requested to steal Primidux Statue by Coachen. His body was found in Allebahst.

characters.name: Ex-Security Lady
characters.description1: The woman behind the Pink Princess mask. I believe her real name is Wendy Oldbag.
